channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【Runtime Context: Missing Piece in Kubernetes Security】运行时上下文：Kubernetes 安全中缺失的部分
item.description: 【Learn about the crucial role of eBPF in enhancing Kubernetes security and how organization can levarge it to gain real-time insights, detect anomalies, and implement more effective security policies】了解 eBPF 在增强 Kubernetes 安全性方面的关键作用，以及组织如何利用它来获得实时洞察、检测异常并实施更有效的安全策略

item.title: 【eBPF Is Coming for Windows】eBPF 即将推出 Windows 版本
item.description: 【eBPF will soon offer cross-platform compatibility for in-kernel programs, for both Linux and Windows】eBPF 很快将为 Linux 和 Windows 内核程序提供跨平台兼容性

item.title: 【eBPF Challenge 3: eBPF Ring Buffer Optimizations】eBPF 挑战 3：eBPF 环形缓冲区优化
item.description: 【Learn how to optimize an eBPF Ring Buffer】了解如何优化 eBPF 环形缓冲区

item.title: 【Unlock Linux superpowers with eBPF, with Bill Mulligan - HS#28】与 Bill Mulligan 一起使用 eBPF 解锁 Linux 超能力 - HS#28
item.description: 【A step-by-step guide to creating your first eBPF program and running it on a Linux system】创建第一个 eBPF 程序并在 Linux 系统上运行它的分步指南

item.title: 【How to write and run an eBPF program on Linux】如何在 Linux 上编写和运行 eBPF 程序
item.description: 【A step-by-step guide to creating your first eBPF program and running it on a Linux system】创建第一个 eBPF 程序并在 Linux 系统上运行它的分步指南

item.title: 【eBPF Challenge 2: Concurrency Issues with eBPF Maps】eBPF 挑战 2：eBPF 映射的并发问题
item.description: 【An eBPF challenge that showcases how to ensure that your eBPF programs update the elements in a race-safe manner, ensuring no instance reads a partially updated structure?】eBPF 挑战展示了如何确保您的 eBPF 程序以竞争安全的方式更新元素，确保没有实例读取部分更新的结构？

item.title: 【How to run code in kernel space? eBPF!】如何在内核空间运行代码？电子BPF！
item.description: 【Learn about eBPF and how to write an eBPF program that capture network packets in the kernel with Go】了解 eBPF 以及如何使用 Go 编写在内核中捕获网络数据包的 eBPF 程序

item.title: 【The Past, Present, and Future of eBPF and Its Path to Revolutionizing Systems】eBPF 的过去、现在和未来及其系统革命之路
item.description: 【Dive into eBPF's journey, explore where it’s headed in the next ten years, and learn about the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead】深入了解 eBPF 的历程，探索未来十年的发展方向，了解未来的挑战和机遇

item.title: 【Cloud Native Networking as Kubernetes Starts Its Second Decade】Kubernetes 开启第二个十年的云原生网络
item.description: 【Dive into how Kubernetes networking and security circulatory systems will grow and adapt】深入了解 Kubernetes 网络和安全循环系统将如何发展和适应

item.title: 【eBPF Tail Calls with Rust Aya】eBPF 尾部调用 Rust Aya
item.description: 【Learn how to implement eBPF Tail Calls using Rust’s Aya】了解如何使用 Rust 的 Aya 实现 eBPF 尾部调用
